snippet: After earning his first PGA Tour victory in February, Kyle Stanley was surprised by how empty he felt. He has since taken on a more holistic approach.
lead_paragraph: After earning his first PGA Tour victory in February, Kyle Stanley was surprised by how empty he felt. He has since taken on a more holistic approach.

headline.seo: Stanley Focusing on Process, No Matter How He’s Golfing
headline.main: Young Golfer Makes Progress in Focusing on Process
headline.print_headline: Young Golfer Makes Progress in Focusing on Process
